text:
@JustinTrudeau #CanadaHomeworkHelp 
We need fully engaged, teacher instructed, online learning by September. 
Not #Homework managed by parents. 
Kids (like my son) at risk of #COVID19 complications wont be able to attend school until a vaccine is available. 
There must be a online equivalent!
